attributes.additional_details:
must bring sanity into our road network.
Dover to Edinburgh journey down the West Coast of Scotland is insane save 90 miles at least with a East
Coast Duel Carriageway.M11 extention to Humber
Bridge saves 50 miles for Hulls HGV.Humber Region
lost over 1000 jobs this year.Dover to Edinburgh duel
would bring transport costs down massively.
Humber Bridge via York to Thirsk and Newcastle to
Edinburgh to complete.200 miles of non stop Duel Carriageway junction must be up or under.
2.6 billion money well spent ,better value than 17 Billion on London to Birmingham HS2
15% ? traffic at M11 end travelling North would use
East Coast Duel saving Cambridge to A1 upgrade
plus A1 Lincolnshire 6 lane upgrade. Labour spent  38
Billion on Transport in South East ,Nothing in the Humber Region Mr Cameron must be fair.How can he spend 17 Billion on HS2 and not 2.6 billion on
East Coast duel with the austerity  the 4 section needed are in unemployment high areas .
